snippet: Mr. Bona, along with Mason Wiley, wrote an encyclopedic, usually affectionate but sometimes acerbic guide called “Inside Oscar: The Unofficial History of the Academy Awards.”
abstract: Damien Bona, expert on the history of the Academy Awards, dies at age 56.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bona, along with Mason Wiley, wrote an encyclopedic, usually affectionate but sometimes acerbic guide called “Inside Oscar: The Unofficial History of the Academy Awards.”

headline.seo: Damien Bona, Creator of ‘Inside Oscar,’ Dies at 56
